content: a quick and easy cowl using the new floating single_crochet clusters stitch pattern worked in spiral rounds with a large hook this stitch pattern yields a soft waffle-weave-like fabric with lovely diagonal lines cowl is edged with simple slip_stitch rounds which complement the textured stitch pattern and provide a clean finish the free pattern can be found on my blog see link below also included are video and phototutorials for the floating single_crochet clusters thanks for viewing and happy crocheting
